ovdesc.p: An archive facility is available to archive data in this file to SC.PRICE.CHANGE.CON$ARC. This will be based on the date in ARCHIVE table, record 'SC.SEC.ARCHIVAL', field PURGE.DATE. Any information prior or equal to this date will be archived when Adhoc service SC.INT.ARCHIVAL is run.

desc.p: Date on which the security price was changed
Record key, consisting of a 2 part id, security number and year contatenated with a dot.
